name: Zombie Bash (itch) (Fist Full of Shrimp)
description:
Zombie Bash is a game jam submission for Scream Jam 2021

It's my first project in 3D and VR! I don't know how many people will be able to play it due to it being in VR, but it was a fun challenge. Models and sound are from previous assets that I've purchased over the years. 

The focus of the game is to prevent zombies from breaking down your fence using a pumpkin catapult. Try and survive as long as you can!

Controls:

Right hand trigger to pull the string back and release to launch.
